Class Simulator

java.lang.Object
Simulator
public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
Main class of simulator slave app, holds the grid for this simulators respective area. Handles commands from master, generates acknowledgements.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Simulator()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addLocation​(Location location)
    Adds the given location to the grid on it's position.
    boolean addPerson​(Person person, Position targetPosition)
    Tries to add new person to target location.
    void calculateHealth()
    Updates health status of people based on spread of the desease.
    void confirmPerson​(int personalNumber, boolean confirmation)
    Removes person with passed personalNumber from people waiting for confirmation.
    Location[] getArea​(Position topLeft, Position size)
    Returns array of all locations in the given area's intersection with this simulator's active area.
    Stats getStats()
    Calculates the counts people with different health statuses.
    void movePeople​(MasterConnection connection)
    Moves all the people to their new location (move part of the round.) This function sends confirmation to the master at the end.
    void setContagionParameters​(ContagionParameters contagionParameters)
    Updates this simulators contagion parameters to the passed ones.
    void setSimulator​(Position topLeft, Position size)
    Sets up the simulator to the given world size, prepares grid for locations.

  • Constructor Details

    • Simulator

      public Simulator()

  • Method Details

    • setSimulator

      public void setSimulator​(Position topLeft, Position size)
      Sets up the simulator to the given world size, prepares grid for locations.
      Parameters:
      topLeft - most top-left position in this simulator's area.
      size - size of this simulator's area

    • movePeople

      public void movePeople​(MasterConnection connection)
      Moves all the people to their new location (move part of the round.) This function sends confirmation to the master at the end.
      Parameters:
      connection - connection to use to send people who want to leave this simulators area.

    • calculateHealth

      public void calculateHealth()
      Updates health status of people based on spread of the desease. (spread part of the round.) This function sends confirmation to the master at the end.

    • addPerson

      public boolean addPerson​(Person person, Position targetPosition)
      Tries to add new person to target location. Return positive or negative confirmation of accepting the Person on the new position.
      Parameters:
      person - person to add.
      targetPosition - position the person want's to visit.
      Returns:
      boolean - true if person was accepted, false otherwise.

    • confirmPerson

      public void confirmPerson​(int personalNumber, boolean confirmation)
      Removes person with passed personalNumber from people waiting for confirmation. removes person from the simulator if confirmation is true.
      Parameters:
      personalNumber - personal number of confirmed person.
      confirmation - true if person was accepted by other simulator, false otherwise.

    • addLocation

      public void addLocation​(Location location)
      Adds the given location to the grid on it's position.
      Parameters:
      location - location to add.

    • setContagionParameters

      public void setContagionParameters​(ContagionParameters contagionParameters)
      Updates this simulators contagion parameters to the passed ones.
      Parameters:
      contagionParameters - parameters to set to the simulator.

    • getStats

      public Stats getStats()
      Calculates the counts people with different health statuses.
      Returns:
      Stats - counts of people of a certain health status (order: healthy, infected, cured, quarantined, deceased, vaccinated)

    • getArea

      public Location[] getArea​(Position topLeft, Position size)
      Returns array of all locations in the given area's intersection with this simulator's active area.
      Parameters:
      topLeft - position of the top-left corner of requested area.
      size - Position(vector) of the x and y coordinate sizes of the requested area.
      Returns:
      array of locations in the given area.
